result.reason: This feature allows users to organize the same connection in multiple folders without duplication, reducing maintenance overhead and improving usability.
result.approach: Introduce a new connection type or property to represent a link/alias, ensuring property retrieval delegates to the target connection while allowing the link to exist independently in the tree structure.
